home.title: Are you looking for a convenient application that will be convenient to manage the process of setting and completing tasks?
home.presentation: I am glad to present to your attention my application PMA. With it, you can easily manage your project, be aware of all the tasks and control the progress of their implementation.

capabilities.second: Personal fully editable list of projects
capabilities.third: Ability to create an unlimited number of task stages and tasks themselves
capabilities.fourth: Ability to add/edit/delete tasks, assign a team of performers and responsible
capabilities.fifth: Instant change of statuses of tasks and projects for the convenience of interaction between the team of performers
capabilities.sixth: Convenient search among the list of all your projects
